name: Up The Way You Go!
description:
Attach Yourself Endless Randomly Generated Circles And Then Jump Off Of Them To Go As High As you Can! There Are Sometimes Spikes On Them,However You Can Shoot Upwards To Blow These Out Of Your Way (Just Be Sure Not To Run Out Of Ammo Or You Will Have to Wait Until It Fully Recharges).

You Can Also Use Your High Score As Currencey In The Menu To By Some Cool Outfits And If You Get Them All-You Get A Cool Trophy In The Menu.

CONTROLS:

Spacebar-Jump Off Of Circles.

LMB-Shoot Upwards.

ESC-Toggle Game Being Paused At Eny Time.
